title: Beautiful Team mates.
body:
Just had the best game as an adc in my life, it started out a little rough but ended amazingly, my team was nothing but supportive and well mannered throughout the entire game I'd just like to make it know not all bronze games are full of toxicity and this wasn't in a pre-made team either.

Players were 

- cBee
- hi im blu3
- Regitmon
- caladborg

Best team I've had. Would have gifted but I'm poor so I honored instead.

http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/128209953/202953304

replies.body:
There are heaps of good low elo players out there.

Great share :)

Good to know there are good people out there
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
